CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topics in Teams Channels
CurrentVersion.description: Earlier this year, we rolled out new Viva Topics integrations with Microsoft Teams. To widen the reach of Topics into the areas team members work, Viva Topics will expand from chats in Teams to channels in Teams, allowing users to mention topics and see topic cards within a given channel.       This addition to the Teams integration will make the Topics experience more intuitive and approachable, allowing you to interact with topics in the spaces you are used to collaborating with team members. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.  We apologize for any inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topics in Teams Channels
OldVersion.description: Earlier this year, we rolled out new Viva Topics integrations with Microsoft Teams. To widen the reach of Topics into the areas team members work, Viva Topics will expand from chats in Teams to channels in Teams, allowing users to mention topics and see topic cards within a given channel.       This addition to the Teams integration will make the Topics experience more intuitive and approachable, allowing you to interact with topics in the spaces you are used to collaborating with team members.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Sharing Experiences - simplifying external sharing
CurrentVersion.description: Respecting the Admin settings, we want to simplify the journey for end-users to share with someone who is external to the organization to improve collaboration. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.  We apologize for any inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Sharing Experiences - simplifying external sharing
OldVersion.description: Respecting the Admin settings, we want to simplify the journey for end-users to share with someone who is external to the organization to improve collaboration.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Graph: Cloud Site List Management Graph APIs
CurrentVersion.description:
New Graph APIs that allow admins in organizations to
create, manage, and publish their site lists for Internet Explorer mode in the
cloud. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.  We apologize for any inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Graph: Cloud Site List Management Graph APIs
OldVersion.description: New Graph APIs that allow admins in organizations to create, manage, and publish their site lists for Internet Explorer mode in the cloud.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Tagging support for groups
CurrentVersion.description: Today, only individual users are able to be added to the Microsoft Defender for Office 365 user tag feature. With this release, organizations will be able to tag groups so that group members will be added to or removed from tags automatically on an ongoing basis.  This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Tagging support for groups
OldVersion.description: Today, only individual users are able to be added to the Microsoft Defender for Office 365 user tag feature. With this release, organizations will be able to tag groups so that group members will be added to or removed from tags automatically on an ongoing basis.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New setting enables meeting participants to move between breakout rooms
CurrentVersion.description: Now, meeting organizers can make the list of breakout rooms visible to all meeting participants and allow them to choose which room to join. Enabling this setting in breakout rooms allows participants to move freely from one room to another, simplifying breakout room coordination for meeting organizers and participants.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New setting enables meeting participants to move between breakout rooms
OldVersion.description: Now, meeting organizers can make the list of breakout rooms visible to all meeting participants and allow them to choose which room to join. Enabling this setting in breakout rooms allows participants to move freely from one room to another, simplifying breakout room coordination for meeting organizers and participants.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Entra:  Microsoft Entra ID - Cross-tenant manager synchronization
CurrentVersion.description: Cross-tenant synchronization will support provisioning a user's manager across tenants.  For existing synchronization configurations that use the default schema (where you haven't made any customizations to the attribute mappings or scoping rules), the manager will start to provision automatically for new users. For existing synchronization configurations that do not use the default schema, you can add the manager attribute to your attribute mappings.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Entra:  Microsoft Entra ID - Cross-tenant manager synchronization
OldVersion.description: Cross-tenant synchronization will support provisioning a user's manager across tenants.  For existing synchronization configurations that use the default schema (where you haven't made any customizations to the attribute mappings or scoping rules), the manager will start to provision automatically for new users. For existing synchronization configurations that do not use the default schema, you can add the manager attribute to your attribute mappings.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Schedule from email with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Often you may want to transition a conversation from an email thread to a meeting. Copilot helps you do this by being able to start scheduling right from the email conversation. It saves you time and effort by generating a meeting invite that's ready for you to review and send. When you click on "Schedule with Copilot" a meeting form will appear with a Copilot generated meeting title, agenda, and conversation summary as well as a pre-filled attendee list from the email thread and an attachment of the original email thread. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows, web, Mac, and mobile. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Schedule from email with Copilot
OldVersion.description: Often you may want to transition a conversation from an email thread to a meeting. Copilot helps you do this by being able to start scheduling right from the email conversation. It saves you time and effort by generating a meeting invite that's ready for you to review and send. When you click on "Schedule with Copilot" a meeting form will appear with a Copilot generated meeting title, agenda, and conversation summary as well as a pre-filled attendee list from the email thread and an attachment of the original email thread. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows, web, Mac, and mobile. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Introducing custom fonts for SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: Fonts are more than just letters and symbols, and we've heard you. We're bringing font customization to your SharePoint and Viva Connections experiences with the brand center. Express your personality, style, and brand by adding custom fonts to your sites and related experiences.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Introducing custom fonts for SharePoint
OldVersion.description: Fonts are more than just letters and symbols, and we've heard you. We're bringing font customization to your SharePoint and Viva Connections experiences with the brand center. Express your personality, style, and brand by adding custom fonts to your sites and related experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Have follow-up conversations with the team
CurrentVersion.description: Get a better understanding of survey results within Viva Pulse reports with team conversations. This item was updated incorrectly and has been corrected.  We apologize for the inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Have follow-up conversations with the team
OldVersion.description: Get a better understanding of survey results within Viva Pulse reports with team conversations. This item was updated incorrectly and has been corrected.  We apologize for the inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Adobe Acrobat Sign Integration with SharePoint eSignature
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint users who are also Adobe Acrobat sign customers can initiate eSignatures directly from PDF documents. The eSignature request will be processed by Adobe and a copy of the signed document will be automatically saved in SharePoint after signing. This reduces the risks of potential data leakage that customers often report as they move sensitive documents between SharePoint and 3rd party eSignature platforms. Manual download or upload of documents will no longer be required when initiating the request or when saving the signed documents back to SharePoint for long term storage.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Adobe Acrobat Sign Integration with SharePoint eSignature
OldVersion.description: SharePoint users who are also Adobe Acrobat sign customers can initiate eSignatures directly from PDF documents. The eSignature request will be processed by Adobe and a copy of the signed document will be automatically saved in SharePoint after signing. This reduces the risks of potential data leakage that customers often report as they move sensitive documents between SharePoint and 3rd party eSignature platforms. Manual download or upload of documents will no longer be required when initiating the request or when saving the signed documents back to SharePoint for long term storage.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Teams Meetings will take the meeting chat into account
CurrentVersion.description: When you ask Copilot in Teams Meetings a question, it will use the chat and transcript as the source.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Teams Meetings will take the meeting chat into account
OldVersion.description: When you ask Copilot in Teams Meetings a question, it will use the chat and transcript as the source.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: New Banner web part (updated title area) in SharePoint Pages and News
CurrentVersion.description: We’ve made some improvements to the title area on top of the page experience. 1 – Title area is removable now, which is no longer required on your page. 2 – Rebranded the title area as a Banner web part with new layouts! You can add one or more banner(s) to any column of your page, including a full-width section.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: New Banner web part (updated title area) in SharePoint Pages and News
OldVersion.description: We’ve made some improvements to the title area on top of the page experience. 1 – Title area is removable now, which is no longer required on your page. 2 – Rebranded the title area as a Banner web part with new layouts! You can add one or more banner(s) to any column of your page, including a full-width section.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Apply coaching suggestions for Coaching by Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Apply coaching suggestions will allow users to request a complete rewrite of their email based on feedback from Coaching by Copilot and in one click, accept and rewrite their email with those suggestions.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Apply coaching suggestions for Coaching by Copilot
OldVersion.description: Apply coaching suggestions will allow users to request a complete rewrite of their email based on feedback from Coaching by Copilot and in one click, accept and rewrite their email with those suggestions.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Chat with Copilot in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get in the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com (work mode) and in other places is now available from within Microsoft Outlook for Mac. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Chat with Copilot in Outlook for Mac
OldVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get in the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com (work mode) and in other places is now available from within Microsoft Outlook for Mac. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights Copilot Dashboard delegation
CurrentVersion.description: Users can delegate access to the Copilot Dashboard to others within their company. Admins can set policies to manage access to the delegation feature.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights Copilot Dashboard delegation
OldVersion.description: Users can delegate access to the Copilot Dashboard to others within their company. Admins can set policies to manage access to the delegation feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Introducing content pane
CurrentVersion.description: The content pane is a new place for relevant panes that help authors create their publications. With the introduction of this centralized location, a new toolbox will help authors quickly browse and add content to create rich and engaging pages. The content pane will include additional panes such as configuration tools and design ideas. Within Viva Amplify, the content pane is used to host the distribution channel selection, writing guidance, and audience selection.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Introducing content pane
OldVersion.description: The content pane is a new place for relevant panes that help authors create their publications. With the introduction of this centralized location, a new toolbox will help authors quickly browse and add content to create rich and engaging pages. The content pane will include additional panes such as configuration tools and design ideas. Within Viva Amplify, the content pane is used to host the distribution channel selection, writing guidance, and audience selection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Brand kit - Extended elements and tenant-wide rollout
CurrentVersion.description: Brand kit enables anyone to create and share brand asset collections including colors, fonts, and logos to easily apply brand elements while creating. This release adds support for images, backgrounds, stickers, video, and audio asset types. An organization's official assets can now be rolled out tenant-wide via SharePoint Organization Asset Libraries (OAL). Brand kit creation, sharing, and manual usage is being made generally available to all Clipchamp for work accounts for users with standard access.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Brand kit - Extended elements and tenant-wide rollout
OldVersion.description: Brand kit enables anyone to create and share brand asset collections including colors, fonts, and logos to easily apply brand elements while creating. This release adds support for images, backgrounds, stickers, video, and audio asset types. An organization's official assets can now be rolled out tenant-wide via SharePoint Organization Asset Libraries (OAL). Brand kit creation, sharing, and manual usage is being made generally available to all Clipchamp for work accounts for users with standard access.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Share open text responses in shared reports
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Pulse authors can now choose to share open text responses as part of their shared reports. Authors can also preview their shared reports and choose to update the visibility of open text responses at any point in time.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Share open text responses in shared reports
OldVersion.description: Viva Pulse authors can now choose to share open text responses as part of their shared reports. Authors can also preview their shared reports and choose to update the visibility of open text responses at any point in time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Network Strength icon to understand strength of your network
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly understand strength of your network along with suggestions to conserve bandwidth if you are experiencing networking issues.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: 3x3 video gallery on dual displays for Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: Dual display rooms are now capable of presenting up to 18 videos (3x3 on each screen) when no content is being shared during meetings. This enhancement ensures a uniform experience across both Windows and Android Teams Rooms devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Restricted Content Discoverability
CurrentVersion.description: This restricts sites from discoverability in organization-wide search and Copilot experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint and Viva Insights Integration for Sentiment and Collaboration Data
CurrentVersion.description: This integration will allow HR users and analysts combine sentiment and collaboration data together into the rhythm of their business to better understand their people’s full work experience. Integrating Viva Glint employee survey scores with Viva Insights data helps identify opportunities and strengths to meet organizational goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Resolve topic name similarities
CurrentVersion.description: Allows users to select a topic among several when they share similar or matching names (disambiguation). This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.  We apologize for any inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Resolve topic name similarities
OldVersion.description: Allows users to select a topic among several when they share similar or matching names (disambiguation).

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Migrate SharePoint 2010 and 2013 workflows to Power Automate
CurrentVersion.description:
Provide Microsoft 365 customers with a tool to migrate SharePoint-based workflows to Power Automate. You will be able to migrate SharePoint 2010 (out-of-the-box and SharePoint Designer) workflows and SharePoint 2013 (SharePoint Designer) workflows to Power Automate flows. The feature will be integrated into the SharePoint Migration Tool (SPMT). This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap. We apologize for any inconvenience.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/sharepointmigration/spmt-workflow-overview

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Migrate SharePoint 2010 and 2013 workflows to Power Automate
OldVersion.description:
Provide Microsoft 365 customers with a tool to migrate SharePoint-based workflows to Power Automate. You will be able to migrate SharePoint 2010 (out-of-the-box and SharePoint Designer) workflows and SharePoint 2013 (SharePoint Designer) workflows to Power Automate flows. The feature will be integrated into the SharePoint Migration Tool (SPMT).
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/sharepointmigration/spmt-workflow-overview

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft To Do: Multi-account support
CurrentVersion.description: Now, you can add multiple accounts to Microsoft To Do on your iOS device. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.  We apologize for any inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft To Do: Multi-account support
OldVersion.description: Now, you can add multiple accounts to Microsoft To Do on your iOS device.
